problem_statement: Optimize the GPU kernel implementation in rocPRIM to reduce runtime and  improve data bytes per second while preserving functional correctness and API behavior. Improve throughput, occupancy, and memory access patterns across all data types. After your optimization, we will use the provided benchmark to measure performance and the unit tests to ensure correctness. Do not change public interfaces, templates, or behavior, and do not modify any benchmark_xxx or test_xxx files. Kernel file:rocprim/include/rocprim/block/block_adjacent_difference.hpp Test file:test/rocprim/test_block_adjacent_difference.cpp Benchmark file:benchmark/benchmark_block_adjacent_difference.cpp
